title: Angular Clock Watch Face
summary: Simple & Cool. Minimal digital watch face inspired by a Japanese company logo.
description: Digital clock watch face inspired by a Japanese company logo.Android Wear Watch Face is supported now.Enjoy it !Of cause, you can also use as desktop clock continuously.- Keeping display on during Angular Clock active- Don't support display edit
descriptionHTML:
Digital clock watch face inspired by a Japanese company logo.

Android Wear Watch Face is supported now.
Enjoy it !


Of cause, you can also use as desktop clock continuously.
- Keeping display on during Angular Clock active
- Don't support display edit
comments: Great Design This is by far one of my favorite watchfaces. Works great on my LG G Watch paired with my Nexus 5 zero bugs. Love the font and how the stop play button turns black when listening to Google Music. Rated 4 stars. Features i'd like to see: Ability to set 24h or 12h AM/PM format, display the date, Toggle ambient mode to color or black or white. This would make it perfect. Would rate 5 stars or even pay for this. Way better than most paid watchfaces. The Japanese know how its done.
Love the font An instant favorite. Needs ambient mode and 12/24 hour opt. Don't know if phone app is a bonus.
